Replication Collection

This is a collection of replication research based on the FORRT Replication Database. Please note that these articles have not necessarily been peer-reviewed or published by Replication Research. This collection serves as a way to make replication research across disciplines visible. To add a replication study, please use this Google form and send an e-mail to lukas.roeseler[at]uni-muenster.de.
